title: Himi 110
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
‘Eiki Laumālie Lelei,
‘Oua na’a ke li’aki
‘A e angahia ko au,
‘I he’eku manavahē.
2.
Na’e lahi ‘eku kovi,
‘Eiki, ki he ‘Afiona,
‘I he’eku fa’a li’aki,
‘A e ngāue lelei ‘a’au.
3.
Ka ke tatali pe, ‘Eiki
‘I ho’o anga’ofa lahi;
Pea ke toe ue’i,
Hoku loto ‘oku kovi.
4.
Na’a ku fai kovi lahi,
‘I he kakai kotoa pē;
He na’a ku ‘ilo lahi,
Ka ne u hoko ‘o li’aki.
5.
Tu’o lahi ‘eku ‘ilo,
Ho’o ngāue angalelei;
Pea tu’o lahi pehē,
‘Eku hanga, ‘o li’aki.
6.
Ka ke fakamolemole,
‘Eiki, ‘eku ngaahi hia;
‘I ho’o ‘ofa kia Sīsū,
Ko hoku Fakalaloa.
7.
Ko hoku hūfanga malū
‘A e ta’ata’a ‘o Sīsū;
Ko e hao’anga ia,
Ki he kakai angahia. *
